amendment.description: Amendment directs the Secretary of Energy to establish within the existing Vehicle Technologies Program an Innovative Automotive Demonstration Program to make competitively awarded grants for the purpose of demonstrating and bringing to market very high energy efficiency vehicles achieving at least 70 miles per gallon.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 111-255 to direct the Secretary of Energy to establish within the existing Vehicle Technologies Program an Innovative Automotive Demonstration Program to make competitively awarded grants for the purpose of demonstrating and bringing to market very high energy efficiency vehicles achieving at least 70 miles per gallon.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Posey amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Posey.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Posey amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
